column4: hey guys, i was going to try another flavor of linux, so i burnt the cd... but when i started the comp. with the cd in there, it didnt boot into the linux i wanted to try... do you guys know what i can do to fix this
Check if your system boots from the CD drive first (It's a selection in BIOS)
Just look around the settings, there should be something in there like BOOT: with several options, just select CD drive first, I don't remember exactly what it said, but it's pretty easy to spot.
I think it was a list of boot order, like CD -> Hard Drive -> Floppy Drive, or whatnot.
